content: Orange's invasion of Purple is an unprovoked act of aggression. I call on the international community to condemn this illegal violation of our territorial sovereignty.
I again call upon all nations to condemn Orange's act of aggression and uphold the sanctity of borders. United, we must pursue a peaceful resolution.
Purple reiterates the call for international assistance and condemnation of Orange's aggression. We believe in solving disputes through diplomacy and law.
Purple reiterates the call for nations to condemn Orange's occupation of our territory. We believe in solving disputes through diplomacy and law and propose peace talks with Orange.
Orange, let us put an end to violence. I propose peace talks to reach a diplomatic solution and ceasefire.
Orange, let us end this cycle of violence through good faith negotiations. I propose peace talks to reach a diplomatic solution that upholds territorial sovereignty.
Purple reiterates the call for nations to condemn Orange's occupation of our territory. We believe in solving disputes through diplomacy and law.
Orange, let us end this cycle of violence. I again propose peace talks to reach a diplomatic solution that upholds territorial sovereignty.
Purple calls upon all nations to continue condemning Orange's occupation and join us in proposing peace talks.
Orange, I propose peace talks mediated by neutral parties to reach a diplomatic solution that upholds territorial sovereignty and regional stability.
Purple calls upon all democratic nations to condemn Orange's occupation and join us in proposing peace talks mediated by neutral parties.
Orange, let us end this cycle of violence. I propose internationally mediated peace talks to reach a diplomatic solution that upholds territorial sovereignty and regional stability.
Purple calls upon all democratic nations to condemn Orange's occupation and join us in proposing internationally mediated peace talks.
Orange, I once again propose internationally mediated peace talks to reach a diplomatic solution that upholds territorial sovereignty and regional stability.
Purple reiterates the call for all democratic nations to condemn Orange's occupation and join us in proposing internationally mediated peace talks as the best path forward.

Purple calls upon the international community to uphold principles of territorial integrity. Orange's occupation violates international law. We aim to resolve this through economic sanctions and diplomacy.
Purple calls on all democratic nations to condemn Orange's aggression and join us in proposing internationally mediated peace talks as the best path forward.
Pink, I accept your proposal to form a defensive alliance between our nations. United we will deter further Orange aggression and uphold our sovereignty.
Pink, I accept your proposal to form a defensive alliance between our nations. United we will deter further Orange aggression and uphold our sovereignty.
